name: Battery Bunny - LDJam 39
description:
Battery Bunny

Barry is a bunny that keeps going and going and going....

The only place he stops is in his nightmares. Help Barry survive his nightmares by  avoiding oncoming  batteries and keeping his own battery full of power.

Controls

  • Space - Recharges battery when the energy bolt is at its largest.
  • Up/Down - Movement to avoid the batteries.
